name: Project Red (Red Fusion Games)
description:
We are Zach Harger and John Morach, two friends with a passion for game development! We met on a Minecraft server years ago, and the rest is history....

This is our first game jam submission ever, and the first project we have worked on together. We will be doing many more in the future, and hope you are willing to come along with us as we learn and create!

Please give us any feedback that you have, as it would greatly improve our skills as we continue to learn game development! :)
